entities

Encode & decode HTML & XML entities with ease & speed.

How to…

…install entities

npm install entities

…use entities

const entities = require("entities");

//encoding
entities.escape("&#38;"); // "&#x26;#38;"
entities.encodeXML("&#38;"); // "&amp;#38;"
entities.encodeHTML("&#38;"); // "&amp;&num;38&semi;"

//decoding
entities.decodeXML("asdf &amp; &#xFF; &#xFC; &apos;"); // "asdf & ÿ ü '"
entities.decodeHTML("asdf &amp; &yuml; &uuml; &apos;"); // "asdf & ÿ ü '"

Performance

This is how entities compares to other libraries on a very basic benchmark (see scripts/benchmark.ts, for 10,000,000 iterations):

Librarydecode performanceencode performanceBundle size
entities10.809s17.683s
html-entities14.029s22.670s
he16.163s44.010s
parse-entities28.507sN/A
